faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does a smart home work?
faq.a1: A smart home system allows remote control of lighting, blinds, air conditioners, cameras and more – via app, voice control or automations.
faq.q2: Can I add smart home to an existing apartment?
faq.a2: Absolutely! Smart systems can be installed in existing apartments, without major renovations.
faq.a3: Our systems include encryption, backups and regular security updates – for complete peace of mind.
